div.p: BPD3 Schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year.

img.alt: Welcome to the Beach Park School District #3 website. If you are using a screen reader, please note that we are focused on making our district web pages accessible. If you find an accessibility issue, please email congena@bpd3.org.

h3.div: 11315 W. Wadsworth Rd., Beach Park, IL 60099

li.strong: (Elementary Schools) Tuesday, May 5th: 8am to 5pm at each Elementary School
(All of 6th Grade Students + [7th Grade Last Names A-M]) Tuesday, May 5th: 8am to 5pm at BPMS
(7th Grade + 8th Grade Last Names N-Z) Wednesday, May 6th: 8am to 5pm at BPMS

li.a: BPD3 Daily Attendance Form (Please only report absences, by 9:30am)

h3.div: As teachers submit e-learning links to post for their classes, they will be added to the Staff Website Pages per School Accessible Here:

p.strong: A medida que los maestros enven enlaces de aprendizaje electrnico para publicar en sus clases, se agregarn a las pginas del sitio web del personal por escuela accesible aqu: https://www.bpd3.org/staff-websites

li.a: Remote Learning Information and Example Schedule

ul.li: Contact murban@bpd3.org for assistance with Clever student usernames and passwords.

li.a: If Chromebooks are still required, they may be checked out by district parents Monday through Thursday, 9am to 2pm from the District Office (847-505-5005) or at BPMS (murban@bpd3.org 847-596-5863).
Affordable or Free Internet Provider Information
Free Xfinity Wireless Hotspots by location

div.p: Vision: To be a nationally recognized district focused on continuous improvement, growth and achievement.
Mission: In partnership with our diverse community, we are committed to developing lifelong learners and productive citizens by fostering academic and social growth.

div.p: Para traducir sta y ortras pginas, pueden utilizar ste link Chrome Web Browser tambien ste otro link Google Translate Extension.
(To translate this and any other web page, use Chrome Web Browser with the Google Translate Extension.)
